profile.rationale: The job advertisement focuses entirely on platform engineering tasks such as infrastructure automation, continuous integration, cloud engineering on AWS, and enhancing developer experience. There is no mention of AI/ML models, generative AI, or related tasks. The responsibilities align with Macro-Category A (Core Software Engineering) without any tasks from Macro-Category B (GenAI Specialization), leading to the 'Software Engineer' profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear and specific about the responsibilities, focusing on platform engineering and cloud infrastructure. There are no ambiguous terms or mentions of AI/ML that would suggest a different profile. The tasks clearly fall into the 'Software Engineer' category.
